participant_1.background:
I sometimes trip over my own feet when I'm playing tennis.
I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it.
i have often been called a slacker.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.
i like hiking up volcanoes.

participant_2.background:
I have never been to a fortune teller, but I would like to know if they could tell me why my sister in law dislikes me.
My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy.
i am in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
i wish i could live in a fantasy world.
My parents are very supportive of my cooking and baking.

content.text: Hello there, what are you up to?
Hi there! I am just hanging out, listening to music.
Nice! What are you listening to?
Right now I am listening to some jazz music.
Oh nice! I love jazz music. I play the saxophone in a jazz band.
Wow! That is awesome! I have always wanted to play the saxophone.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it out.
I might just have to do that! Do you play any other instruments?
I also play the piano and the guitar.
Oh wow! You are quite the musician!
Thanks! I try my best. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook and bake. I also enjoy reading and playing video games.
That's great! I also love to cook and bake.
Maybe we should cook together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to try some of your cooking.
And I would love to try some of yours!
